official_title: A bill for the relief of Leroy W. Shebal of North Pole, Alaska.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain property in Alaska and transfer title to it in fee simple to a named individual upon receipt of specified notification and payment.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Leroy W. Shebal of North Pole, Alaska.
